p:
At Kealakehe, Rock Bottom, and Wonderview, 20 CDC autocidal gravid ovitraps (AGO) and 20 Biogents BG-Sentinel (BG) traps with black covers and without carbon dioxide (CO 2) were paired and placed on opposite sides of houses within a 200-m radius of the case-patient ( Table 1).
22 Trapping at the three locations was conducted for 14 days. At Hilo, Telephone Exchange, and Milolii, BG traps using CO 2 lures without black covers were deployed for 7 days ( Table 1). BG-Sentinel traps were monitored daily and AGO traps were checked every 3â€“4 days. Additional BG traps without black covers that varied in use of CO 2 were placed in areas where DENV or the presence of Ae. aegypti was suspected, and informal surveys of aquatic habitats were performed at Waipio and Oceanview ( Table 1).
